sn55.5:1: Then the Venerable Sāriputta approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, and sat down to one side. The Blessed One then said to him:
sn55.5:2: "Sāriputta, this is said: ‘The stream, the stream.’ What now, Sāriputta, is the stream?"
sn55.5:3: "Sāriputta, this is said: ‘A stream-enterer, a stream-enterer.’ What now, Sāriputta, is a stream-enterer?"
